member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.Language.Entity
member.remarks: An entity represents a value extracted from a spoken utterance or textual input which may be required to perform some action. This class may be used to represent a single entity containing a type, value and a score.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Language.Entity.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the entity.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Language.Entity.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the entity type name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Language.Entity.Score
member.summary: Gets or sets the confidence score of the entity.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.Language.Intent
member.remarks: An intent is typically determined from a spoken utterance or textual input. This class may be used to represent a single intent containing a string value and a score.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Language.Intent.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the intent string.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Language.Intent.Score
member.summary: Gets or sets the confidence score of the intent.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.Language.IntentData
member.summary: Represents a collection of intents and entities.
member.remarks: This class may be used by language understanding components to represent the detected intents and extracted entities from spoken or textual input, or utterances.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Psi.Language.IntentData.IntentDataSerializer
member.summary: A static instance of the serializer used to deserialize the JSON object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Language.IntentData.Query
member.summary: Gets or sets the original query from which the current intent data was extracted.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Language.IntentData.Intents
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of intents detected.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Language.IntentData.Entities
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of entities extracted.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Psi.Language.IntentData.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.
